name: Kikugi
overview: Kikugi is a single player single screen puzzle game, developed and published by 576 KByte and released in 1993. Kikugi is an ancient Japanese game of concentration and strategy. The aim is to jump one peg over another, removing from the board the peg that you jumped, ending up with one piece which should be in the center of the board. Multiple levels\game boards are available; each one has a different set number of pieces. Game was published in a two-pack with Tetris from 576 Byte.
